TEXT.English: %s1 successfully converted %d2 cities to our faith!
TEXT.French: %s1 successfully converted %d2 cities to our faith!
TEXT.German: %s1 hat %d2 Städte erfolgreich zu unserem Glauben konvertiert!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 successfully converted %d2 cities to our faith!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 successfully converted %d2 cities to our faith!

TEXT.English: %s1 failed to convert any cities to our faith.
TEXT.French: %s1 failed to convert any cities to our faith.
TEXT.German: %s1 konnte keine Städte zu unserem Glauben konvertieren.
TEXT.Italian: %s1 failed to convert any cities to our faith.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 failed to convert any cities to our faith.

TEXT.English: Disappointed by your recent decision, many soldiers and citizens leave your realm!
TEXT.French: Disappointed by your recent decision, many soldiers and citizens leave your realm!
TEXT.German: Enttäuscht über Eure jüngste Entscheidung verlassen viele Soldaten und Bürger Euer Reich!
TEXT.Italian: Disappointed by your recent decision, many soldiers and citizens leave your realm!
TEXT.Spanish: Disappointed by your recent decision, many soldiers and citizens leave your realm!

TEXT.English: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Schaibanidische Usbeken haben Buchara erobert und ein neues Khanat ausgerufen!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Kartid Dynasty has come to power in Afghanistan!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Jalayirids seize power in Baghdad!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: Circassian tribes unite in the North Caucasus!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Nogai Horde establishes itself on the Yaik!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: Zunghar tribes consolidate power in Zhetysu!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Kalmyks move to occupy the lower Volga region!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Chalukyas defeat the Rashtrakutas and seize the western Deccan!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: Oleg of Novgorod establishes himself in the Dnieper basin!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: A confederation of Turkic tribes assert power in the Eurasian steppe!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: Batu Khan establishes power on the Volga, and de facto independence from the Mongol Empire!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Muzaffarids have asserted control of Fars!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Black Sheep Turkomans have secured their independence!
TEXT.French: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.German: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Italian: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Shaybanid Uzbeks have captured Bukhara and proclaimed a new khanate!

TEXT.English: The Mongols have destroyed the House of Wisdom in %s1_city!
TEXT.French: The Mongols have destroyed the House of Wisdom in %s1_city!
TEXT.German: Die Mongolen haben das Haus der Weisheit in %s1_city zerstört!
TEXT.Italian: The Mongols have destroyed the House of Wisdom in %s1_city!
TEXT.Spanish: The Mongols have destroyed the House of Wisdom in %s1_city!

TEXT.English: The Shia Buyids have conquered the province of Fars!
TEXT.French: The Shia Buyids have conquered the province of Fars!
TEXT.German: Die schiitischen Buyiden haben die Provinz Fars erobert!
TEXT.Italian: The Shia Buyids have conquered the province of Fars!
TEXT.Spanish: The Shia Buyids have conquered the province of Fars!

TEXT.English: The Persian Samanid dynasty has established an independent kingdom in Greater Khorasan!
TEXT.French: The Persian Samanid dynasty has established an independent kingdom in Greater Khorasan!
TEXT.German: Die persische Samaniden-Dynastie hat in Khorasan ein unabhängiges Königreich gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: The Persian Samanid dynasty has established an independent kingdom in Greater Khorasan!
TEXT.Spanish: The Persian Samanid dynasty has established an independent kingdom in Greater Khorasan!

TEXT.English: Prince Ashot Bagratuni has proclaimed himself king and established an independent Armenian state!
TEXT.French: Prince Ashot Bagratuni has proclaimed himself king and established an independent Armenian state!
TEXT.German: Prinz Ashot Bagratuni hat sich selbst zum König erklärt und einen unabhängigen armenischen Staat gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: Prince Ashot Bagratuni has proclaimed himself king and established an independent Armenian state!
TEXT.Spanish: Prince Ashot Bagratuni has proclaimed himself king and established an independent Armenian state!

TEXT.English: Shia Zaidis have established an independent Imamate in Yemen!
TEXT.French: Shia Zaidis have established an independent Imamate in Yemen!
TEXT.German: Schiitische Zaiditen haben im Jemen ein unabhängiges Imamat gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: Shia Zaidis have established an independent Imamate in Yemen!
TEXT.Spanish: Shia Zaidis have established an independent Imamate in Yemen!

TEXT.English: Bohemond of Taranto has claimed the Principality of Antioch!
TEXT.French: Bohemond of Taranto has claimed the Principality of Antioch!
TEXT.German: Bohemund von Taranto beansprucht das Fürstentum Antiochia!
TEXT.Italian: Bohemond of Taranto has claimed the Principality of Antioch!
TEXT.Spanish: Bohemond of Taranto has claimed the Principality of Antioch!

TEXT.English: Mulraj Solanki has overthrown the Chavda rule in Gujarat and proclaimed himself King of Gurjaresh!
TEXT.French: Mulraj Solanki has overthrown the Chavda rule in Gujarat and proclaimed himself King of Gurjaresh!
TEXT.German: Mulraj Solanki hat die Chavda-Herrschaft in Gujarat gestürzt und sich selbst zum König von Gurjaresh ernannt!
TEXT.Italian: Mulraj Solanki has overthrown the Chavda rule in Gujarat and proclaimed himself King of Gurjaresh!
TEXT.Spanish: Mulraj Solanki has overthrown the Chavda rule in Gujarat and proclaimed himself King of Gurjaresh!

TEXT.English: Ghaznavids have declared independence from the Samanid kingdom!
TEXT.French: Ghaznavids have declared independence from the Samanid kingdom!
TEXT.German: Die Ghaznaviden haben ihre Unabhängigkeit vom Samanidenreich erklärt!
TEXT.Italian: Ghaznavids have declared independence from the Samanid kingdom!
TEXT.Spanish: Ghaznavids have declared independence from the Samanid kingdom!

TEXT.English: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.French: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.German: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Italian: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Spanish: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!

TEXT.English: The Karluks, Yagmas, and Chigils have established the Kara Khanid Khanate!
TEXT.French: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.German: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Italian: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Spanish: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!

TEXT.English: Yelu Dashi has seized control of Zhetysu and proclaimed the Western Liao dynasty!
TEXT.French: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.German: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Italian: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Spanish: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!

TEXT.English: The Chagatai Khanate has established its independence from the Mongol Empire!
TEXT.French: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.German: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Italian: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!
TEXT.Spanish: The Shia Fatimids have conquered Egypt and established an independent caliphate!

TEXT.English: Abkhazian King Bagrat III has inherited the throne of Kartli, unifying Georgia under one monarch!
TEXT.French: Abkhazian King Bagrat III has inherited the throne of Kartli, unifying Georgia under one monarch!
TEXT.German: Der abchasische König Bagrat III. hat den Thron von Kartli geerbt und Georgien unter einem Monarchen vereint!
TEXT.Italian: Abkhazian King Bagrat III has inherited the throne of Kartli, unifying Georgia under one monarch!
TEXT.Spanish: Abkhazian King Bagrat III has inherited the throne of Kartli, unifying Georgia under one monarch!

TEXT.English: Seljuk conquests in Iran have lead to the formation of the Great Seljuk Empire!
TEXT.French: Seljuk conquests in Iran have lead to the formation of the Great Seljuk Empire!
TEXT.German: Die Eroberungen der Seldschuken im Iran führten zur Bildung des Großseldschukenreiches!
TEXT.Italian: Seljuk conquests in Iran have lead to the formation of the Great Seljuk Empire!
TEXT.Spanish: Seljuk conquests in Iran have lead to the formation of the Great Seljuk Empire!

TEXT.English: Soomro, a native Sindhi family, has established an independent Shia sultanate with its capital at Mansura!
TEXT.French: Soomro, a native Sindhi family, has established an independent Shia sultanate with its capital at Mansura!
TEXT.German: Soomro, eine einheimische Sindhi-Familie, hat ein unabhängiges schiitisches Sultanat mit der Hauptstadt Mansura gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: Soomro, a native Sindhi family, has established an independent Shia sultanate with its capital at Mansura!
TEXT.Spanish: Soomro, a native Sindhi family, has established an independent Shia sultanate with its capital at Mansura!

TEXT.English: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!
TEXT.French: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!
TEXT.German: Seldschuken haben in Anatolien das Sultanat Rûm gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!
TEXT.Spanish: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!

TEXT.English: The Alans have consolidated a kingdom in the Caucasus!
TEXT.French: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!
TEXT.German: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!
TEXT.Italian: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!
TEXT.Spanish: Seljuks have established the Sultanate of Rum in Anatolia!

TEXT.English: Anushtigin Gharchai, a Seljuk commander and governor of Khwarezm, has proclaimed himself a Sultan!
TEXT.French: Anushtigin Gharchai, a Seljuk commander and governor of Khwarezm, has proclaimed himself a Sultan!
TEXT.German: Anushtigin Gharchai, ein seldschukischer Kommandant und Gouverneur von Choresm, hat sich selbst zum Sultan erklärt!
TEXT.Italian: Anushtigin Gharchai, a Seljuk commander and governor of Khwarezm, has proclaimed himself a Sultan!
TEXT.Spanish: Anushtigin Gharchai, a Seljuk commander and governor of Khwarezm, has proclaimed himself a Sultan!

TEXT.English: The valiant Frankish crusaders have founded the Latin Kingdom of Jerusalem!
TEXT.French: The valiant Frankish crusaders have founded the Latin Kingdom of Jerusalem!
TEXT.German: Die tapferen fränkischen Kreuzfahrer haben das lateinische Königreich Jerusalem gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: The valiant Frankish crusaders have founded the Latin Kingdom of Jerusalem!
TEXT.Spanish: The valiant Frankish crusaders have founded the Latin Kingdom of Jerusalem!

TEXT.English: Seljuks have appointed Imad ad-Din Zengi as the new Atabeg of Mosul.
TEXT.French: Seljuks have appointed Imad ad-Din Zengi as the new Atabeg of Mosul.
TEXT.German: Seldschuken haben Imad ad-Din Zengi zum neuen Atabeg von Mossul ernannt.
TEXT.Italian: Seljuks have appointed Imad ad-Din Zengi as the new Atabeg of Mosul.
TEXT.Spanish: Seljuks have appointed Imad ad-Din Zengi as the new Atabeg of Mosul.

TEXT.English: Ghor province breaks away from the Ghaznavid Sultanate!
TEXT.French: Ghor province breaks away from the Ghaznavid Sultanate!
TEXT.German: Die Provinz Ghor löst sich vom ghaznavidischen Sultanat!
TEXT.Italian: Ghor province breaks away from the Ghaznavid Sultanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Ghor province breaks away from the Ghaznavid Sultanate!

TEXT.English: The indigenous Nabhani tribe has taken control of Oman and established an independent kingdom!
TEXT.French: The indigenous Nabhani tribe has taken control of Oman and established an independent kingdom!
TEXT.German: Der indigene Nabhani-Stamm hat die Kontrolle über Oman übernommen und ein unabhängiges Königreich gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: The indigenous Nabhani tribe has taken control of Oman and established an independent kingdom!
TEXT.Spanish: The indigenous Nabhani tribe has taken control of Oman and established an independent kingdom!

TEXT.English: Revolution in Egypt! A Zengid general, Salah ad-Din, have ousted the Fatimids in Cairo and established an independent Sunni Sultanate!
TEXT.French: Revolution in Egypt! A Zengid general, Salah ad-Din, have ousted the Fatimids in Cairo and established an independent Sunni Sultanate!
TEXT.German: Revolution in Ägypten! Ein zengidischer General, Salah ad-Din, hat die Fatimiden in Kairo vertrieben und ein unabhängiges sunnitisches Sultanat gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: Revolution in Egypt! A Zengid general, Salah ad-Din, have ousted the Fatimids in Cairo and established an independent Sunni Sultanate!
TEXT.Spanish: Revolution in Egypt! A Zengid general, Salah ad-Din, have ousted the Fatimids in Cairo and established an independent Sunni Sultanate!

TEXT.English: Mamluk soldiers have deposed the governor of Cairo and assumed control of most of Egypt!
TEXT.French: Mamluk soldiers have deposed the governor of Cairo and assumed control of most of Egypt!
TEXT.German: Mamluken-Soldaten haben den Gouverneur von Kairo abgesetzt und die Kontrolle über den größten Teil Ägyptens übernommen!
TEXT.Italian: Mamluk soldiers have deposed the governor of Cairo and assumed control of most of Egypt!
TEXT.Spanish: Mamluk soldiers have deposed the governor of Cairo and assumed control of most of Egypt!

TEXT.English: Osmanli Turks are rapidly expanding into Bithynia and Thrace!
TEXT.French: Osmanli Turks are rapidly expanding into Bithynia and Thrace!
TEXT.German: Osmanische Türken breiten sich rasch nach Bithynien und Thrakien aus!
TEXT.Italian: Osmanli Turks are rapidly expanding into Bithynia and Thrace!
TEXT.Spanish: Osmanli Turks are rapidly expanding into Bithynia and Thrace!

TEXT.English: Timur has been crowned the Amir of Transoxiana!
TEXT.French: Timur has been crowned the Amir of Transoxiana!
TEXT.German: Timur wurde zum Emir von Transoxiana gekrönt!
TEXT.Italian: Timur has been crowned the Amir of Transoxiana!
TEXT.Spanish: Timur has been crowned the Amir of Transoxiana!

TEXT.English: The White Sheep Turkomans have established an independent state in Diyarbakir!
TEXT.French: The White Sheep Turkomans have established an independent state in Diyarbakir!
TEXT.German: Die Weißhammel-Turkmenen haben in Diyarbakir einen unabhängigen Staat gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: The White Sheep Turkomans have established an independent state in Diyarbakir!
TEXT.Spanish: The White Sheep Turkomans have established an independent state in Diyarbakir!

TEXT.English: The Shia Safavids have taken control of Azerbaijan!
TEXT.French: The Shia Safavids have taken control of Azerbaijan!
TEXT.German: Die schiitischen Safawiden haben die Kontrolle über Aserbaidschan übernommen!
TEXT.Italian: The Shia Safavids have taken control of Azerbaijan!
TEXT.Spanish: The Shia Safavids have taken control of Azerbaijan!

TEXT.English: Babur, a descendant of Timur, has begun the conquest of India.
TEXT.French: Babur, a descendant of Timur, has begun the conquest of India.
TEXT.German: Babur, ein Nachkomme Timurs, hat mit der Eroberung Indiens begonnen.
TEXT.Italian: Babur, a descendant of Timur, has begun the conquest of India.
TEXT.Spanish: Babur, a descendant of Timur, has begun the conquest of India.

TEXT.English: %s1 has lost much of its territory due to internal struggles!
TEXT.French: %s1 has lost much of its territory due to internal struggles!
TEXT.German: %s1 hat aufgrund interner Kämpfe einen Großteil seines Territoriums verloren!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has lost much of its territory due to internal struggles!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has lost much of its territory due to internal struggles!

TEXT.English: Your empire is suffering from severe instability!
TEXT.French: Your empire is suffering from severe instability!
TEXT.German: Euer Imperium leidet unter schwerer Instabilität!
TEXT.Italian: Your empire is suffering from severe instability!
TEXT.Spanish: Your empire is suffering from severe instability!

TEXT.English: A revolt took place in the city of %s1_city!
TEXT.French: A revolt took place in the city of %s1_city!
TEXT.German: In der Stadt %s1_city kam es zu einer Revolte!
TEXT.Italian: A revolt took place in the city of %s1_city!
TEXT.Spanish: A revolt took place in the city of %s1_city!

TEXT.English: A traitor has opened the gates of %s1_city! The city is in panic!
TEXT.French: A traitor has opened the gates of %s1_city! The city is in panic!
TEXT.German: Ein Verräter hat die Tore von %s1_city geöffnet! Die Stadt ist in Panik!
TEXT.Italian: A traitor has opened the gates of %s1_city! The city is in panic!
TEXT.Spanish: A traitor has opened the gates of %s1_city! The city is in panic!

TEXT.English: The first degree-granting university has been opened in %s1_city (%s2_adj).
TEXT.French: The first degree-granting university has been opened in %s1_city (%s2_adj).
TEXT.German: Die erste Universität, die einen Abschluss verleiht, wurde in %s1_city (%s2_adj) eröffnet.
TEXT.Italian: The first degree-granting university has been opened in %s1_city (%s2_adj).
TEXT.Spanish: The first degree-granting university has been opened in %s1_city (%s2_adj).

TEXT.English: The Holy City of Jerusalem has fallen into the hands of %s1_civ!
TEXT.French: The Holy City of Jerusalem has fallen into the hands of %s1_civ!
TEXT.German: Die Heilige Stadt Jerusalem ist in die Hände von %s1_civ gefallen!
TEXT.Italian: The Holy City of Jerusalem has fallen into the hands of %s1_civ!
TEXT.Spanish: The Holy City of Jerusalem has fallen into the hands of %s1_civ!

TEXT.English: The city of Constantinople has fallen into %s1_adj hands!
TEXT.French: The city of Constantinople has fallen into %s1_adj hands!
TEXT.German: Die Stadt Konstantinopel ist in %s1_adj Hände gefallen!
TEXT.Italian: The city of Constantinople has fallen into %s1_adj hands!
TEXT.Spanish: The city of Constantinople has fallen into %s1_adj hands!

TEXT.English: You have massacred all the disbelievers in %s1_city and looted extra %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: You have massacred all the disbelievers in %s1_city and looted extra %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: Du hast alle Ungläubigen in %s1_city massakriert und zusätzlich %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD] erbeutet.
TEXT.Italian: You have massacred all the disbelievers in %s1_city and looted extra %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: You have massacred all the disbelievers in %s1_city and looted extra %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective forces have massacred the innocent inhabitants of %s2_city!
TEXT.French: %s1_civ_adjective forces have massacred the innocent inhabitants of %s2_city!
TEXT.German: %s1_civ_adjective Armeen haben die unschuldigen Bewohner von %s2_city massakriert!
TEXT.Italian: %s1_civ_adjective forces have massacred the innocent inhabitants of %s2_city!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_civ_adjective forces have massacred the innocent inhabitants of %s2_city!

TEXT.English: Your inquisitor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.French: Your inquisitor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.German: Euer Inquisitor hat %s2_religion erfolgreich aus %s1_city entfernt und %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] von den Opfern beschlagnahmt.
TEXT.Italian: Your inquisitor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.Spanish: Your inquisitor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.

TEXT.English: Your inquisitor in %s1_city was unsuccessful.
TEXT.French: Your inquisitor in %s1_city was unsuccessful.
TEXT.German: Euer Inquisitor in %s1_city war erfolglos.
TEXT.Italian: Your inquisitor in %s1_city was unsuccessful.
TEXT.Spanish: Your inquisitor in %s1_city was unsuccessful.

TEXT.English: %s2_religion has been purged from %s1_city.
TEXT.French: %s2_religion has been purged from %s1_city.
TEXT.German: %s2_religion wurde aus %s1_city gelöscht.
TEXT.Italian: %s2_religion has been purged from %s1_city.
TEXT.Spanish: %s2_religion has been purged from %s1_city.

TEXT.English: The Pope has awarded you with a holy relic to further strengthen the faith of your people.
An inquisitor sent from Rome has arrived in %s1_city. He is now awaiting your orders.
The Great Schism divides Christianity into Greek and Latin Churches.
Jewish refugees settle in %s1_city.
TEXT.French: Jewish refugees settle in %s1_city.
TEXT.German: Jüdische Flüchtlinge lassen sich in %s1_city nieder.
TEXT.Italian: Jewish refugees settle in %s1_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Jewish refugees settle in %s1_city.

TEXT.English: The veneration of icons has been outlawed in the city of %s1_city. The Iconoclastic movement begins!
TEXT.French: The veneration of icons has been outlawed in the city of %s1_city. The Iconoclastic movement begins!
TEXT.German: Die Verehrung von Ikonen wurde in der Stadt %s1_city verboten. Die ikonoklastische Bewegung beginnt!
TEXT.Italian: The veneration of icons has been outlawed in the city of %s1_city. The Iconoclastic movement begins!
TEXT.Spanish: The veneration of icons has been outlawed in the city of %s1_city. The Iconoclastic movement begins!

TEXT.English: Iconoclasm has spread in %s1_city!
TEXT.French: Iconoclasm has spread in %s1_city!
TEXT.German: Der Ikonoklasmus hat sich in %s1_city ausgebreitet!
TEXT.Italian: Iconoclasm has spread in %s1_city!
TEXT.Spanish: Iconoclasm has spread in %s1_city!

TEXT.English: Heresy has spread in %s1_city!
TEXT.French: Heresy has spread in %s1_city!
TEXT.German: Häresie hat sich in %s1_city ausgebreitet!
TEXT.Italian: Heresy has spread in %s1_city!
TEXT.Spanish: Heresy has spread in %s1_city!

TEXT.English: The Qarmatian Revolution has started in southern Iraq!
TEXT.French: The Qarmatian Revolution has started in southern Iraq!
TEXT.German: Die qarmatische Revolution hat im Südirak begonnen!
TEXT.Italian: The Qarmatian Revolution has started in southern Iraq!
TEXT.Spanish: The Qarmatian Revolution has started in southern Iraq!

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian invasion is occurring. The Mongol assault on Central Asia has begun!
TEXT.French: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.German: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.Italian: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.Spanish: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!

TEXT.English: The Grand Duke of Lithuania declares a crusade against the Tatars!
TEXT.French: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.German: Es kommt zu einem massiven Barbarenaufstand. Die mongolische Invasion in Choresmien hat begonnen!
TEXT.Italian: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.Spanish: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!

TEXT.English: Cossacks under Tsar Ivan IV attack the Tatar cities on the Volga!
TEXT.French: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.German: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.Italian: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!
TEXT.Spanish: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Mongol invasion of Khwarezmia has begun!

TEXT.English: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.French: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.German: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Italian: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Spanish: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!

TEXT.English: The Knights Hospitaller set their sights on the fortress of Rodos!
TEXT.French: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.German: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Italian: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Spanish: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!

TEXT.English: Kyrgyz tribesmen move to expel the Moghuls from Zhetysu!
TEXT.French: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.German: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Italian: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Spanish: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!

TEXT.English: Uzbek warrior Muhammad Shaybani commences his invasion of Khorasan!
TEXT.French: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.German: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Italian: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!
TEXT.Spanish: The armies of Mongol Empire have reached the Caucasus!

TEXT.English: The Mongol Empire has launched a full scale invasion of Armenia and Georgia!
TEXT.French: The Mongol Empire has launched a full scale invasion of Armenia and Georgia!
TEXT.German: Das Mongolenreich hat eine umfassende Invasion in Armenien und Georgien gestartet!
TEXT.Italian: The Mongol Empire has launched a full scale invasion of Armenia and Georgia!
TEXT.Spanish: The Mongol Empire has launched a full scale invasion of Armenia and Georgia!

TEXT.English: Mongol armies have been spotted in Hindustan!
TEXT.French: Mongol armies have been spotted in Hindustan!
TEXT.German: Es wurden mongolische Armeen in Hindustan gesichtet!
TEXT.Italian: Mongol armies have been spotted in Hindustan!
TEXT.Spanish: Mongol armies have been spotted in Hindustan!

TEXT.English: The army of Hulagu Khan has been spotted moving towards Baghdad!
TEXT.French: The army of Hulagu Khan has been spotted moving towards Baghdad!
TEXT.German: Die Armee von Hulagu Khan wurde auf dem Weg nach Bagdad gesichtet!
TEXT.Italian: The army of Hulagu Khan has been spotted moving towards Baghdad!
TEXT.Spanish: The army of Hulagu Khan has been spotted moving towards Baghdad!

TEXT.English: The Mongol Empire has launched a major offensive with the intent of conquering Anatolia!
TEXT.French: The Mongol Empire has launched a major offensive with the intent of conquering Anatolia!
TEXT.German: Das Mongolenreich hat eine große Offensive gestartet, um Anatolien zu erobern!
TEXT.Italian: The Mongol Empire has launched a major offensive with the intent of conquering Anatolia!
TEXT.Spanish: The Mongol Empire has launched a major offensive with the intent of conquering Anatolia!

TEXT.English: Chagatai Khanate has launched a full scale invasion of Northern Hindustan!
TEXT.French: Chagatai Khanate has launched a full scale invasion of Northern Hindustan!
TEXT.German: Das Tschagatai-Khanat hat eine groß angelegte Invasion in Nord-Hindustan gestartet!
TEXT.Italian: Chagatai Khanate has launched a full scale invasion of Northern Hindustan!
TEXT.Spanish: Chagatai Khanate has launched a full scale invasion of Northern Hindustan!

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Timur's troop trample through Transoxiana and Persia, killing men and women, old and young!
TEXT.French: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Timur's troop trample through Transoxiana and Persia, killing men and women, old and young!
TEXT.German: Es kommt zu einem massiven Barbarenaufstand. Timurs Truppe trampelt durch Transoxien und Persien und tötet Männer und Frauen, alte und junge!
TEXT.Italian: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Timur's troop trample through Transoxiana and Persia, killing men and women, old and young!
TEXT.Spanish: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Timur's troop trample through Transoxiana and Persia, killing men and women, old and young!

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Hordes of Turkoman raiders are moving towards the heartland of Persia!
TEXT.French: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Hordes of Turkoman raiders are moving towards the heartland of Persia!
TEXT.German: Es kommt zu einem massiven Barbarenaufstand. Horden turkmenischer Plünderer rücken in das Kernland Persiens vor!
TEXT.Italian: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Hordes of Turkoman raiders are moving towards the heartland of Persia!
TEXT.Spanish: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Hordes of Turkoman raiders are moving towards the heartland of Persia!

TEXT.English: A massive army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving westward from the Iranian Plateau.
TEXT.French: A massive army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving westward from the Iranian Plateau.
TEXT.German: Es wurde eine riesige Armee seldschukischer Türken gesichtet, die vom iranischen Plateau nach Westen zog.
TEXT.Italian: A massive army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving westward from the Iranian Plateau.
TEXT.Spanish: A massive army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving westward from the Iranian Plateau.

TEXT.English: Armies of the Ghorid Dynasty have begun a full scale assault on Northern India!
TEXT.French: Armies of the Ghorid Dynasty have begun a full scale assault on Northern India!
TEXT.German: Armies of the Ghorid Dynasty have begun a full scale assault on Northern India!
TEXT.Italian: Armies of the Ghorid Dynasty have begun a full scale assault on Northern India!
TEXT.Spanish: Armies of the Ghorid Dynasty have begun a full scale assault on Northern India!

TEXT.English: Unhappy with the Sultan's rule, Seljuk nobles have invited the Shah of Khwarezm to conquer their lands!
TEXT.French: Unhappy with the Sultan's rule, Seljuk nobles have invited the Shah of Khwarezm to conquer their lands!
TEXT.German: Unhappy with the Sultan's rule, Seljuk nobles have invited the Shah of Khwarezm to conquer their lands!
TEXT.Italian: Unhappy with the Sultan's rule, Seljuk nobles have invited the Shah of Khwarezm to conquer their lands!
TEXT.Spanish: Unhappy with the Sultan's rule, Seljuk nobles have invited the Shah of Khwarezm to conquer their lands!

TEXT.English: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Norman crusaders from the Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.French: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Norman crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.German: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Norman crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.Italian: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Norman crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.Spanish: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Norman crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.

TEXT.English: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Frankish crusaders from the Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.French: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Frankish crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.German: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Frankish crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.Italian: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Frankish crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.
TEXT.Spanish: The Mamluks of Egypt move to expel the Frankish crusaders from The Levant, once and for all.

TEXT.English: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and the Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.French: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.German: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.Italian: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.Spanish: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.

TEXT.English: Timur begins his expansion into Eastern Persia!
TEXT.French: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.German: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.Italian: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.
TEXT.Spanish: Timurid horsemen sweep into Central Persia, pushing towards Iraq, Anatolia, and The Caucasus with worrying speed.

TEXT.English: The Buyids of Daylaman have defeated the Ziyards and are marching towards Mesopotamia!
TEXT.French: The Buyids of Daylaman have defeated the Ziyards and are marching towards Mesopotamia!
TEXT.German: Die Buyiden von Daylaman haben die Ziyarden besiegt und marschieren in Richtung Mesopotamien!
TEXT.Italian: The Buyids of Daylaman have defeated the Ziyards and are marching towards Mesopotamia!
TEXT.Spanish: The Buyids of Daylaman have defeated the Ziyards and are marching towards Mesopotamia!

TEXT.English: Rebellion in Tabaristan! New rulers - the Ziyarids - have gathered enough forces to invade inner Iran!
TEXT.French: Rebellion in Tabaristan! New rulers - the Ziyarids - have gathered enough forces to invade inner Iran!
TEXT.German: Aufstand in Tabaristan! Neue Herrscher - die Ziyariden - haben genug Streitkräfte gesammelt, um in den inneren Iran einzumarschieren!
TEXT.Italian: Rebellion in Tabaristan! New rulers - the Ziyarids - have gathered enough forces to invade inner Iran!
TEXT.Spanish: Rebellion in Tabaristan! New rulers - the Ziyarids - have gathered enough forces to invade inner Iran!

TEXT.English: Kara-Khanid Khanate invades Transoxiana and Sogdiana!
TEXT.French: Kara-Khanid Khanate invades Transoxiana and Sogdiana!
TEXT.German: Das Karachaniden-Khanat dringt in Transoxien und Sogdien ein!
TEXT.Italian: Kara-Khanid Khanate invades Transoxiana and Sogdiana!
TEXT.Spanish: Kara-Khanid Khanate invades Transoxiana and Sogdiana!

TEXT.English: A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_resource[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.French: Notre source [NUM1:de:d'] [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_resource[COLOR_REVERT] est perdue.
TEXT.German: Verlust der Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_resource[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_resource[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:finito:finita].
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM1:Se ha perdido el:Se ha perdido la:Se han perdido los:Se han perdido las] [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_resource[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: %s3_civ_adjective [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT] growers open business near %s2_CityName!
TEXT.French: Vous avez découvert une source de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] près de %s2_CityName !
TEXT.German: Ihr habt in der Nähe der Stadt %s2_CityName ein Vorkommen des Bonusguts [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] entdeckt!
TEXT.Italian: Hai scoperto una risorsa di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] vicino a %s2_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis descubierto una fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] cerca de %s2_CityName.

TEXT.German: Ihr habt in der Nähe der Stadt %s2_CityName ein Vorkommen des Bonusguts [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] entdeckt!
TEXT.Italian: Hai scoperto una risorsa di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] vicino a %s2_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis descubierto una fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] cerca de %s2_CityName.

TEXT.English: %s3_civ_adjective farmers begin planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] cane near %s2_CityName!
TEXT.French: Vous avez découvert une source de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] près de %s2_CityName !
TEXT.German: Ihr habt in der Nähe der Stadt %s2_CityName ein Vorkommen des Bonusguts [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] entdeckt!
TEXT.Italian: Hai scoperto una risorsa di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] vicino a %s2_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis descubierto una fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] cerca de %s2_CityName.

TEXT.English: %s3_civ_adjective sailors have spotted a new population of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName!
TEXT.French: Des marins ont repéré une nouvelle population de baleines.
TEXT.German: Seeleute haben eine neue Walschule entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: I marinai hanno individuato una nuova popolazione di balene.
TEXT.Spanish: Los marineros han avistado una nueva población de ballenas.
